input.sentences: a group of friends went out to have a night out on the city .
the evening started with a few drinks .
they watched a parade that celebrated the day of the dead .
there was so many interesting things to see during the parade .
output.sentences: Walking across the bridge for a night out with friends in the city.
Everyone starts the evening at the bar with some tasty drinks.
After drinks, everyone went outside to watch the Night of the Living Dead parade.
The best part of the parade was when the skeletons passed by.
No one in the group could have asked for a better way to end an evening then with a parade.
